scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.neuralnetwork

Class FullyConnectedLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.neuralnetwork.FullyConnectedLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvolutionLayer, FullyConnectedLayerWarp

    class FullyConnectedLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the basic shell of a fully connected layer.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Field Detail

      • eventHandler

        public final ArtificialNeuralNetworkEventHandler eventHandler
        An event handler will be required to ensure that the network error is reducing after each training iteration.

      • mlp

        protected org.neuroph.nnet.MultiLayerPerceptron mlp
        The multi layer perceptron that will be trained and tested with. No modifier so that extending class within the package can access the neural network.

      • trainingData

        protected org.neuroph.core.data.DataSet trainingData
        The training data data set which will be used to train the multi layer perceptron. No modifier so that extending class within the package can access the training data set.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpNeuralNetwork

        public void setUpNeuralNetwork(double maxError,
                               double learningRate,
                               int iterations)
        Sets up the basics parameters for the neural networks and adds an event action listener.
        Parameters:
        maxError - The maximum level of error the network is allowed in order to stop back propagating.
        learningRate - The learning rate of the neural network. between 0 - 1. Preferably around 0.7.
        iterations - If the network isn't stopped by the neural network reaching the max error that has been set, then how many times should it keep trying to reduce the error before it gives up.
        See Also:
        ArtificialNeuralNetworkEventHandler.handleLearningEvent(org.neuroph.core.events.LearningEvent)
